mapper.select: select * from applydoc where applydoc.DocTypeId=#{doctype} and applydoc.ApplyId=#{applyid}
mapper.update: update applydoc set DocTypeId = #{doctypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ApplyId = #{applyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{doctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DocName = #{docname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DocPath = #{docpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ApplyDocId = #{applydocid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
